message.content:
I need to find the final depreciation amount in the income statement based on the transaction data.

Looking through the data, I need to identify all transactions related to depreciation. This will specifically be transactions with the type "Depreciation".

Examining the transactions table, I can see there's one depreciation record:

| id | type | date | recorded_date | amount | recorded_amount |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Depreciation20240101001 | Depreciation | 2024-01-01 | 2024-01-01 | 45765.700000000004 | 45765.700000000004 |

This represents the depreciation expense recorded in the given period. This is the amount that would appear in the income statement as the depreciation expense.

The value is 45765.700000000004, which is approximately 45765.70.

Therefore, the final depreciation item in the income statement is 45765.70.

```json
{"solution": {'Depreciation': '45765.70'}}
```
